column4: yes I fixed my laptops battery! it was so dead, nothing would charge it so I gave it the electronic equivalent of a kick in the head, by shorting the +/- terminals for 5 minutes :)
i was a bit worried i thought i screwed my battery up with acpi settings but as a last resort that worked lol
Wow, I just did a similar thing! I fixed my car by driving it into a ditch!
